name: Hordle
description:
--KNOWN ISSUES--

The text isn't the most accessible one I had access to, but I'm learning how to handle that. For now I matched theme, but will think about getting a more accessible font in there if I keep developing on the project.

--ABOUT THE GAME--

Riding the wave of Wordle popularity, I made a free platformer for folks who want a little added challenge to their word hunting. Remember Wordle is meant to be enjoyed once per day with no ads or fees, so I tried my best to stick to that model!

--HOW TO PLAY--

Tap the screen to jump, collect letters, make words! Wordle rules apply otherwise.

If you haven't played Wordle: https://www.powerlanguage.co.uk/wordle/

(There is a quick tutorial for Hordle available in the top-right  menu screen if you need it.)

--CREDITS--

Code mostly by Zach Lounsberry (@YouCarryOats). Some player code modified from Kenney's Pixel Line Platformer: https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-line-platformer

Almost all assets (except for like a button and popup or two), fonts, music, most sound effects by Kenney: https://kenney.nl/

Small handful of sounds created using JSFX: https://sfxr.me/
